text: Murder on Dante Street () is a 1956 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Romm.Актеру и режиссеру Михаилу Козакову 14 октября исполнилось бы 85 летУбийство на улице Данте It stars Yevgeniya Kozyreva, Mikhail Kozakov, and Nikolai Komissarov. == Actors == * Yevgeniya Kozyreva as Madeleine Thibault * Mikhail Kozakov as Charles Thibault, Madeleine's son * Nikolai Komissarov as Hippolyte, Madeleine's father * Maksim Shtraukh as Philipp Thibault, Madeleine's husband * Rostislav Plyatt as Grin, Madeleine's impresario == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1956 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Romm
title: Murder on Dante Street
